title: LIVE - FREE 1HR KDP Keyword Training - Publisher Rocket

tactics.name: Keyword Volume & Sales Analysis
tactics.description: Prioritize keywords with high search volume and sales data to ensure shopper intent matches product availability
steps: Brainstorm keyword ideas related to book content
Input keywords into Publisher Rocket for analysis
Compare search volume vs. estimated sales metrics
caveats: Public domain books have different competition dynamics
source_quotes: we want to find keywords that have search volume this is the number one variable
we want to ensure that we have one search volume two people are buying from this keyword

tactics.name: low_search_volume_high_intent
tactics.description: Target keywords with low search volume but high purchase intent for consistent sales and ranking potential
steps: Prioritize keywords where most searchers convert to buyers
Use Publisher Rocket to analyze monthly earnings vs. searches
caveats: Requires long-term strategy for ranking higher keywords
source_quotes: this has a 455 competitor which is good under 500
people who are searching for it which isn't many are actually buying

tactics.name: misspelling_keyword_hunting
tactics.description: Identify misspelled keywords with low competition and high earnings potential
steps: Prioritize long-tail keywords with extra words

tactics.name: low_search_volume_strategy
tactics.description: Target keywords with low search volume but high search-to-purchase ratio
steps: Filter keywords with low monthly search volume
Focus on keywords with high earnings potential
source_quotes: this is a low search volume ratio compared to what's being made here

heuristics.name: Competition Score Threshold
heuristics.condition: If competition score exceeds 50 for non-public domain books, prioritize lower competition keywords
source_quotes: you want to have competition that your specific book can compete against
for anything else right and we can we don't even worry about this

heuristics.name: boost_low_competition_keywords
heuristics.condition: If competition score is under 500 and conversion rate is high, prioritize these keywords

heuristics.name: review_count_threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize for growth
